name: Castle Defenders
description:
Castle Defenders is a tower defense game where you fight enemy dragons with your own dragons to protect your kingdom. There are three player dragon types: fire dragon, bomb dragon, and time dragon. Fire dragons have great range, but don't do well against rock dragons. Bomb dragons do well against rock dragons but don't have good range. Time dragons slow down enemies for a certain period of time. Try to survive for as many waves as you can!

Unique things about this game

Medieval setting

Dragon that slows enemies

Type advantages and weaknesses of player dragons

Controls

Left Click on an image of a dragon to select that dragon

Left Click on a grass square to place the dragon
